meanings.definition: A number of people or things sharing a specified characteristic and following one after the other.
meanings.sent1: In the play, the successions of kings were portrayed with different personalities.
meanings.sent2: The successions of colors in the rainbow create a beautiful spectrum.
meanings.sent3: The successions of animals entering the ark made for a comical sight.
meanings.sent4: The successions of waves crashing onto the shore seemed never-ending.
meanings.sent5: The successions of cars in the traffic jam stretched for miles.

meanings.definition: The action or process of inheriting a title, office, property, etc.
meanings.sent1: Her successions of jewelry were passed down through generations.
meanings.sent2: The successions of monarchs in history books show the transfer of power.
meanings.sent3: The successions of funny hats in the family became a tradition.
meanings.sent4: The successions of keys symbolized the authority of the new manager.
meanings.sent5: The successions of paintings in the gallery displayed the artist's evolution.

meanings.definition: The right or process of succeeding to an inheritance.
meanings.sent1: The lawyer explained the legal successions to the family members.
meanings.sent2: Understanding the successions of wealth distribution is crucial in estate planning.
meanings.sent3: The successions of siblings arguing over the inheritance became a comedy of errors.
meanings.sent4: The successions of responsibilities fell on the eldest son.
meanings.sent5: The successions of traditions passed down from grandparents hold sentimental value.
